title: Mexican Corn (Esquites)
directions: Grill corn, turning occasionally, until lightly charred and tender, 8 to 12 minutes total.
Meanwhile, whisk mayonnaise, sour cream, scallion, cheese, lime zest, lime juice, salt and chile powder in a medium bowl.
Cut the kernels from the cobs. Add to the bowl and toss to combine.
ingredients: ¾ cup crumbled cotija cheese or queso fresco, plus more for garnish
